snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio’s administration on Friday announced long-awaited revisions to school discipline policies, including new suspension procedures.
abstract: Mayor Bill de Blasio's administration says student discipline code for New York City public schools will undergo changes in order to ease harshest punishments while maintaining school safety.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio’s administration on Friday announced long-awaited revisions to school discipline policies, including new suspension procedures.

headline.main: Suspension Rules Altered in New York City’s Revision of School Discipline Code
headline.print_headline: Suspension Rules Altered in City’s Revision of School Discipline Code
